backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor serving as the backend canister placeholder with no methods implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the HP Partner First Silver certificate image was removed from the Certifications component while keeping all other section content intact.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file, describing their roles in the HIZMET IT Services single-page application.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS entry point for the frontend; currently empty.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the React SPA, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component that composes the full page layout by rendering Header, Hero, Services, Products, Certifications, AMC, and Footer sections in order.
frontend/src/components/AMC.tsx: Annual Maintenance Contract section that displays AMC benefits (priority support, preventive maintenance, cost-effective replacements) in a card with checkmark icons.
frontend/src/components/Certifications.t: Certifications & Partnerships section displaying an HP Partner First Silver badge card with partner tier label and expiry date, without any certificate image.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying company address, multiple contact numbers and email, business hours, and business credentials (UDYAM, GST, GeM Seller ID) in a four-column grid.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with the company logo, desktop nav links, and a collapsible mobile menu that smooth-scrolls to page sections.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with a full-width background image, headline, description, and two CTA buttons for calling and scrolling to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Products section rendering three hardware product cards (laptops, desktops, peripherals) each with an image, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Services section displaying five IT service offerings (hardware repairs, printing, networking, data recovery, software) in a responsive card grid without images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with OKLCH color variables, custom fonts, shadows, border radii, and accordion animations, plus typography and container-query plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata and feature state, recording one completed feature to remove the HP Partner First Silver certificate image from the Certifications component.
